snippet: The United Nations and the United States expressed fears that another massacre was pending as government and rebel forces exchanged fire in and around Homs, leaving civilians to fend for themselves.
abstract: United Nations reports intense fighting between the Syrian military and opposition forces in multiple locations across the country and expresses alarm about civilians trapped in besieged rebel strongholds in the central city of Homs and northwestern village of Al Heffa.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations and the United States expressed fears that another massacre was pending as government and rebel forces exchanged fire in and around Homs, leaving civilians to fend for themselves.

headline.seo: Fears for Trapped Civilians as Syria Fighting Continues
headline.main: U.N. Fears for Syrians Trapped by Fighting
headline.print_headline: U.N. Fears For Syrians Trapped By Fighting

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
